mapper.select: /* manageMapper.selectUserById */ SELECT manage_seq, id, passwd, name, authority, enabled, store_seq, use_yn FROM MANAGEINFO WHERE id = #{id}

/* manageMapper.manageDetail */ SELECT mginfo.manage_seq, mginfo.id, mginfo.passwd, mginfo.name, mginfo.authority, mginfo.enabled, mginfo.store_seq, ( SELECT store_name FROM STOREINFO WHERE store_seq = mginfo.store_seq ) AS store_name, use_yn FROM MANAGEINFO mginfo WHERE id = #{id}
/* manageMapper.manageDupIdCheck */ SELECT manage_seq, id, name, authority FROM MANAGEINFO WHERE id = #{id}
